warehouse.desk: You see a KEY (type 'get key' to add it to your inventory)

boss office.boss: Boss wakes up and tells you to let him sleep

front office.desk: No one is in the front desk

break room.refrigerator: It is full of lunch boxes and energy drinks that aren't yours
break room.coffee maker: You check the COFFEE pot to see if there is enough to fill your thermos

gas station.drink aisle: Door after door of different SODA
gas station.attendant: Thank you for stopping, have a wonderful day!!!

hr office.teddy bear: All dirty and torn, sitting in a corner.
hr office.complaint box: Box is empty. You write a complaint about your boss for sleeping in office again
hr office.trash can: You see a balled up paper. You un-ball it and see it's a note from your manager trying to fire you again...

tech room.laptop: You see your broken laptop that was supposed to be fixed 3 weeks ago
